statements: SELECT * FROM credit_education_program LIMIT 5;
SELECT participant_id, name, program_name FROM credit_education_program WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM credit_education_program WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM credit_education_program WHERE participant_id = 1001;
SELECT participant_id, program_name, end_date FROM credit_education_program ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_education_program WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT participant_id, name FROM credit_education_program WHERE program_name = 'AI Certification';
SELECT * FROM credit_education_program WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM credit_education_program ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT program_name, COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM credit_education_program GROUP BY program_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM credit_education_program;
SELECT participant_name, education_start_date, credit_score_after FROM credit_education_program WHERE credit_score_after >= 700;
SELECT participant_name, education_start_date, education_end_date FROM credit_education_program ORDER BY education_start_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participation_date, participation_category FROM participation_history WHERE participation_category = 'Workshop' ORDER BY participation_date ASC;
SELECT participant_name, credit_score_before, credit_score_after FROM credit_education_program WHERE credit_score_before < credit_score_after;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, credit_score_before, credit_score_after FROM credit_education_program WHERE credit_score_before > 700 ORDER BY credit_score_before DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, education_start_date, education_end_date FROM credit_education_program WHERE education_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT participant_id, participation_date, participation_category FROM participation_history WHERE participation_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY participation_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT participant_id, education_start_date, education_end_date, credit_score_before, credit_score_after FROM credit_education_program WHERE credit_score_after < credit_score_before ORDER BY credit_score_after ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT participant_id, participant_name, participation_date, participation_category FROM credit_education_program JOIN participation_history ON credit_education_program.participant_id = participation_history.participant_id WHERE participation_date < '2022-07-01' ORDER BY participation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM credit_program_participants
SELECT user_id, program_id FROM credit_program_participants ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM credit_programs WHERE program_id = 1
SELECT user_id, current_score FROM credit_scores WHERE current_score > 700
SELECT user_id, program_id, completion_status FROM credit_program_participants WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT user_id, program_id, enrollment_date, completion_status FROM credit_program_participants WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT program_id, program_name, program_description FROM credit_programs WHERE program_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, current_score, score_improvement_goal FROM credit_scores WHERE current_score > 700;
SELECT * FROM credit_program_participants ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_id FROM credit_programs WHERE program_name LIKE '%Credit%' ORDER BY program_id ASC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM Credit_Programs;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM Participants;
SELECT score_id, participant_id, score, date_recorded FROM Credit_Scores;
SELECT history_id, participant_id, transaction_details, transaction_date FROM Credit_History;
SELECT * FROM Participants ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Credit_Programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM Credit_Programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, phone_number, program_name FROM Participants JOIN Credit_Programs ON Participants.program_id = Credit_Programs.program_id;
SELECT participant_id, score, date_recorded FROM Credit_Scores WHERE score > 700 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT participant_id, transaction_details, transaction_date FROM Credit_History WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM credit_application;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, credit_score FROM credit_application WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT program_name, participation_date FROM program_participants ORDER BY participation_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, description FROM program_details WHERE credit_points > 10 ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT instructor_name, experience_years FROM program_instructors WHERE experience_years BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT applicant_name, credit_score FROM credit_application
SELECT * FROM program_participants WHERE program_name = 'Financial Literacy'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM program_details
SELECT participant_name, program_name, participation_date FROM program_participants ORDER BY participation_date DESC
SELECT credit_score, update_date, reason FROM credit_score_history WHERE reason LIKE '%approval%'
